name: Asp
effect: Destroys a single Program installed on the enemy Netrunner's Cyberdeck at random
icon: Golden, Egyptian, cobra, spitting beams of neon green light

name: Giant
effect: 3d6 direct to brain, Netrunner is forcibly and unsafely jacked-out (do not suffer from the giant jack out effect)
icon: A massive pair of feet and ankle tower above the Netrunner

name: Hellhound
effect: 2d6 direct, Unless insulated cyberdeck and clothes catchs fire (need a meat action to bypass), 2dmg per round of fire, cannot stack
icon: A huge, black metal wolf, it eyes glow white and fire runs in ripples all over its body, it speaks in grating, metallic voice, repeating Netrunner's name

name: Kraken
effect: 3d6 direct, until the end of Netrunner's turn, they cannot change floor or safely jack out
icon: A mass of trashing, orange tentacles protruding from the walls, their suckers are covered in sticky red goop

name: Liche
effect: Netrunner's INT, REF, and DE are lwered by 1d6 for 1hour, effects are psychomatic (no permanent effects)
icon: Metallic skeleton draped in black robes, its hands are studded with blackened rings that soark electricity

name: Raven
effect: Derezzes a single defender program at random and inflict 1d6 direct damage
icon: Raven adorned in plate armor wielding a glowing white lance

name: Scorpion
effect: Netrunner MOVE is lowered by 1d6 for 1hour, effects are psychomatic (no permanent effects)
icon: A tiny black Scorpion that hisses very loudly whenever Netrunner speaks

name: Skunk
effect: Until Derezzed, -2 to slide, each skunk affects one Netrunner but effect stacks
icon: Cartoon skunk that walks on its hind legs, following Netrunner too closely

name: Wisp
effect: 1d6 direct damage to the Netrunner's brain, -1 Net action on Netrunner's turn (2 min)
icon: Orb of light with a single minuscule eye crackling with energy

name: Dragon
effect: 6d6 damage to program, a derezz becomes a destroy
icon: Golden-scaled dragon robot wreathed in electrical discharges

name: Killer
effect: 4d6 damage to progra, a derezz becomes a destroy
icon: Robotic samurai with red eyes wielding a glowing katana

name: Sabertooth
REZ: 6d6 damage to program, a derezz becomes a destroy
effect: Immense hulking cat with glowing white tusks
